name: Class Level Breakdown
shortdescription:
The class level breakdown shows you the different classes for a specified phylum in a grouped barchart.

The data is normalized to allow comparison of differnt sized samples.
description:
The class level breakdown shows you the different classes for a specified phylum.

The currently preselected phylum is Proteobacteria. Use the $filter to change the phylum you want to look at.
author: MG-RAST
